com.buyanova.specification

Interface SqlSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Specification
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FindAllHorses, FindAllNonPerformingHorses, FindAllPerformingHorses, FindBetById, FindBetsByUserId, FindHorseById, FindHorsesPerformingInRace, FindHorsesWhoseNameStartsWithPattern, FindOddsByHorseIdAndRaceId, FindOddsById, FindOddsByRace, FindPastRacesSortedDescendingByDateWithLimitAndOffset, FindRaceById, FindRacesAfterCurrentDate, FindRacesAfterCurrentDateWithoutOdds, FindRacesWithoutResults, FindUserById, FindUserByLogin, FindUserByLoginAndPassword, FindUsersSortedByLoginWithLimitAndOffset, FindUsersWhoseLoginStartsWithPattern

    public interface SqlSpecification
extends Specification
    Specification to indicate search criteria based on sql queries.

    Should be used in classes that implement Repository interface and use sql database as a data source.

    See Also:
    Specification, SqlUserRepository.query(Specification), FindUserByLoginAndPassword

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.PreparedStatement toSqlStatement(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Returns a sql query wrapped up in PreparedStatement.

    • Method Detail

      • toSqlStatement

        java.sql.PreparedStatement toSqlStatement(java.sql.Connection connection)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a sql query wrapped up in PreparedStatement.
        Parameters:
        connection - database connection to prepare statement on
        Returns:
        a sql query wrapped up in PreparedStatement
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
